string-array.name: introdution_titles
string-array.item: The colorful memories, the wonderful ideas, the warm moments,the unforgettable moments, lets us preserve for you, preserves for the whole life.

Use picture and voice record what we see,make the recording content more rich.No matter you are having a meeting or a class,write down your notes while reconding,without worrying about anything missing.
Before your trip, make a detailed plan ，make a baggage detailed list,check Flight information,do the schedule，planning tourist routes,check examination introduced.....just record it

string-array.name: default_note
string-array.item: Click the recording file and listen to my introduction ~

string-array.name: introdution_content_menu
string-array.item: new note，and group into different classes.
only one click,you can save your notes to local computer、Pad and so on,and will be able to check them anytime and anywhere.

string-array.name: introdution_content_edit
string-array.item: the classes of the notes,click to change
you can mark your note as something important
click to find more~(add geographic location,labels and attachments to your notes)

string-array.name: introdution_content_mix
string-array.item: take photo,record and write both together
